body.name: Furrion Aurora 43-Inch Full-Shade 4K Outdoor TV - Weatherproof HDR10 LED Television with Anti-Glare, 400-Nit LED Screen, Auto-Brightness Control for Shaded Outdoor Areas - 2021123752
features: Enhanced 4K HDR display: The new Furrion Aurora 2021 model offers premium 4K UHD HDR screen with LED backlight to deliver sharper images with vivid colors and higher contrast for an exceptional viewing experience

Built for Outdoor Entertainment: Designed for fully shaded outdoor living areas like covered patios or screened porches, the Furrion Aurora Full Shade TV brings the family together outdoors and extends your living space. Built-in speakers add to the outdoor AV entertainment experience. Great for movies, sports, and so much more

Exceptional Viewing in Dark and Light: Adaptive brightness delivers high-quality images any time of the day, thanks to an anti-glare display that automatically adjusts the brightness to shifting outdoor light conditions. Its 400-nit brightness, which is up to 70% brighter than indoor TVs, delivers ultra-bright pictures for fully shaded areas

Climate & Weatherproof: Weatherproof IP54 housing is designed for permanent outdoor installation and is engineered to withstand rain, snow, UV rays, dirt, salt air and humidity. Furrion Aurora is built with Climatesmart technology to reliably cope with extreme temperature variations. Secure weather-tight media bay on the back of the TV keeps all of your connections safe, seals out moisture and allows for easy hookup. All connectors are zinc plated to resist corrosion from moisture

Warranty & Accessories: Furrion Outdoor TVs are manufactured to the highest quality and industry standards, and are backed by Furrion's 1-yr warranty. It supports connectivity with multiple media inputs including HDMI, USB, antenna and AV. The protective media bay designed to house smaller streaming devices while allowing for strong Wi-Fi connectivity includes 3 HDMI ports, as well as 2 5V USB ports. An IP67-rated magnetic and waterproof remote control is included with the Furrion Aurora models

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: HDR HDR 10 technology delivers deep blacks, bright whites and vibrant color with high contrast and clear details for a rich viewing experience.​ 4K Ultra HD​ ​ The 4K Ultra-High Definition screen delivers crystal clear images and an ultra-bright picture at 4x the resolution of full HD. High Brightness The display has a stunning picture with 400-nit brightness and wide viewing angles. Designed for use in fully-shaded areas like covered patios, decks, yards.
Enjoy breath-taking starry movie nights with a Furrion Aurora Outdoor TV. ​

Weatherproof​ Experience year-round outdoor entertainment in any climate with weatherproof, IP54-rated housing engineered to withstand rain, dust, snow, and UV rays, as well as extreme temperature variations. Auto-Brightness Control The ambient light sensor with auto-brightness control automatically changes the screen’s lighting levels, adjusting to bright and dark conditions for optimal viewing at all times. Anti-Glare Enjoy your favorite movies and shows even on sunny days, with an anti-glare display that minimizes reflection and makes it perfect for outdoor viewing.​ Connectivity Furrion Aurora's weather-resistant media bay supports connectivity with multiple media inputs including HDMI, USB, antenna and AV. Play videos from your favorite platform (e.g. Roku, Amazon, Google) with simple plug-in connections. ​

Full Shade Specifications Input Power 100 - 240V AC Resolution 3840 x 2160 Refresh Rate 60Hz Contrast Ratio 4000:1 View Angle 178 degree/ 178 degree Brightness 400 nits # HDMI Inputs 3 # of Audio LR Outputs 1 # of Antenna (RF) Inputs 1 # of Composite AV Inputs 1 # of Component (YPbPr) Inputs 1 # of USB Inputs 2 # of Coaxial Audio Outputs 1 HDMI Version 2.0 Response Time 6.5ms Audio Output (Watts - THD 10%) 8W x 2

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Outdoor Television
reviews.reviewText: This television is built to handle anything the elements can throw at it. The picture is bright and clear but you definitely need to hook up external speakers or the outdoor speaker bar that's designed specifically for this television. You will also need a strong outdoor television wall mount. This unit is very heavy and requires a quality unit to hold it up safely and securely.Great unit for the price! You won't be disappointed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Love the clarity and size but the component box audio jacks doesn't seal or close tightly .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars great tv except souund
reviews.reviewText: Loved what the tv could do outside EXCEPT We had sound turned to 100 and still hard to hear.Buying separate speakers so we can watch outside

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 9, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Need External Speakers
reviews.reviewText: Overall, this TV is very good. After one year of using an indoor TV on a covered patio (Texas) until the TV stopped working, I concluded that an outdoor TV was needed. The rear of this TV is fully enclosed and has a hinged, sealed door to access connections. It is quite heavy. Picture quality is very good. My only complaint is that the sound quality is horrible. And I’m not an audiophile. I would strongly recommend external speakers.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Never buy from Walts TV
reviews.reviewText: Walt's TV has the worst customer service. I received a TV I ordered and cut the tape on the top of the box and realized the TV I had ordered was not going to work. I never took it out of the box. I returned the TV and they said it was damaged when it came back, which it was NOT. But since I broke the seal of the box they are saying it is. Absolutely ridiculous. They are saying that they don't have to give me all of my money back for this $900 TV. They will only refund $500 something. I cannot believe this!!!! I am in dispute with Amazon about not getting a refund credited at all. Amazon should evaluate doing business with Walt's TV. This is unacceptable as I did NOTHING wrong and the TV was never removed from the box. Do not buy anything that Amazon has from Walt's TV if this is how they treat their customers.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great TV for price
reviews.reviewText: We bought this TV for our covered porch and so far we love it! Compared to paying a significantly higher price at best buy for the same product was well worth it to buy here. Great picture and good sound but we will be adding some speakers later on.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very good TV
reviews.reviewText: I have this TV mounted on the outside of my RV. It has a cover on it but it still has done an awesome job. I can actually watch football outside and see the screen. The sound is good. This TV has been through rain, ice, wind, and 9 degree Fahrenheit weather and it keeps on kicking!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This TV is build to be outside
reviews.reviewText: Very easy to set up, so far so good. Nice quality picture.
